name: Smash the Market
description:
Based on the classic board game Stock Ticker, play the stock market to make the most money.

Choose your dice order and knock previous roles to manipulate the market in your favour!

See in-game how to play for rules.

Controls:

A/D/Left/Right: Rotate around board

Q W E: Select die

Click: Shoot die

Made for GMTKJam 2022.

Programmed by Chris Greenslade and Riker Greenslade

Music by Matt Rempel (https://itch.io/profile/matt-rempel)
